title: Once upon Australia. River red
creator_credit: ABC-TV (Australia), Klaus Toft and Nicholas Hilligoss
brief_description: ‘Once upon Australia’ examines our dinosaur past, vividly recreating giant goannas and marsupials using animation. This is a world where humans have little or no part. ‘River Red’ profiles the natural environment of one of Australia’s best known trees, the River Red Gum.
